alert.note: Alert for Brookings; Kingsbury (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 20 at 9:04AM MST until February 23 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of 14 to 21 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 to 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Minnesota and east central South Dakota. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds during the daytime Tuesday are expected to remain below 25 to 30 mph with the potential for blizzard conditions not arriving until Wednesday. Periods of a relative lull in snowfall may occur during the daytime hours Wednesday with moderate to heavy snow rates arriving late Wednesday into early Thursday.
info.instruction: Prepare for possible blizzard conditions. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
